body:
Well i changed my mine to not leave avicus ;)!


Well this is my third suggestion! The suggestion is could we add a subform called suggestions?

This is how it would look like http://imgur.com/WRopECf



Pls give me feedback for what do you think of it :D!

title: (Suggestion) Suggestion subform!

replies.body: I guess Suggestions come under Server Feedback
replies.body_tagged: I guess Suggestions come under Server Feedback

replies.body: Typically, we use "Server Feedback", so I don't think this would be necessary. As well as for the new suggestion system, I think it'll be best left to Server Feedback from where we started it.
replies.body_tagged: Typically, we use "Server Feedback", so I don't think this would be necessary. As well as for the new suggestion system, I think it'll be best left to Server Feedback from where we started it.
